name: AMERICAN FUEL AND PETROCHEMICAL MANUFACTURERS (AFPM)
description: American trade assoc. that represents fuel & petrochemical mfr. in the petroleum Industry
sampleDescriptions: Tax issues related to tax reform including H.R. 1, Bill to provide for reconciliation pursuant to titles II and V of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2018 (bill formerly known as the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act), S. 1, an original bill to provide for reconciliation pursuant to title II of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2018, and H.R. 1892, Bipartisan Budget Act of 2018.

Tax issues related to tax reform including H.R. 1, Bill to provide for reconciliation pursuant to titles II and V of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2018 (bill formerly known as the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act), S. 1, an original bill to provide for reconciliation pursuant to title II of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2018.

Tax issues related to tax reform including H.R. 1, Bill to provide for reconciliation pursuant to titles II and V of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2018 (bill formerly known as the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act), S. 1, an original bill to provide for reconciliation pursuant to title II of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2018, and energy related tax issues.

Tax issues related to tax reform including H.R. 1, Bill to provide for reconciliation pursuant to titles II and V of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2018 (bill formerly known as the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act), S. 1, an original bill to provide for reconciliation pursuant to title II of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2018, energy related tax issues, H.R. 7065, Bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to establish a new phaseout of the credit for plug-in electric drive motor vehicles, and S. 3582, Bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to establish a new phaseout of the credit for plug-in electric vehicles.
